summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 2, Block 21, Replat of Pleasant Valley Addition; Lots 1 and 2, Block 1, Buena Vista Addition No. 2; Lots 4 and 5, Block 16, Bayview Addition; and a portion of the N. E. one-quarter of the S. W. one-quarter of Section 14, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M.; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-177 and 17-127, respectively.
